original_text: “But if you carefully obey his voice and do all that I say, then I will be an enemy to your enemies and an adversary to your adversaries.
korean_text: 네가 그의 목소리를 잘 청종하고 내 모든 말대로 행하면 내가 네 원수에게 원수가 되고 네 대적에게 대적이 될지라

sentences.original_text: But if you carefully obey his voice
sentences.korean_translation: 그러나 너희가 그의 목소리를 주의 깊게 듣고

sentences.original_text: and do all that I say,
then I will be an enemy to your enemies
and an adversary to your adversaries.
